CustomField.description: If the user has access to MyIllumina and has purchasing capabilities, the Enable Web Quoting field allows Customers to self-generate CPQ Quotes on MyIllumina.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the user has access to MyIllumina and has purchasing capabilities, the Enable Web Quoting field being set to YES will make the account eligible for online quoting in MyIllumina.
CustomField.label: Enable Web Quoting
